name: EkomiIntegration
description:
This plugin allows you to integrate your Plentymarkets Store easily with eKomi system to collect verified reviews. 
    Before installing and activating your plugin, please contact support@ekomi.de, this is necessary to ensure everything has been set up correctly and activated from eKomiâ€™s side.

shortDescription.de: Diese plugin erlaubt es Ihnen Ihren Plentymarkets Store eShop ganz einfach im eKomi System zu integrieren um verifizierte Rezensionen zu sammeln.
shortDescription.en: This plugin allows you to integrate your Plentymarkets shop easily with eKomi system to collect verified reviews.

author: eKomi Ltd
